description: An AI agent simulates the drug discovery process, analyzing molecular structures and predicting binding affinities.  The process involves iterative model training and refinement, along with data analysis and reporting.
initial_goal: Simulate and analyze 1000 molecular structures to identify potential drug candidates for treating type 2 diabetes, prioritizing molecules with high predicted binding affinity to a known target protein and low predicted toxicity.
constraints: model_versioning: Use only approved model versions
